alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 18 at 4:05AM MDT until May 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch Thursday, west winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts around 45 to 55 mph likely. * WHERE...Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Idaho Falls, Roberts, Rexburg and St Anthony. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from noon today to 9 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Blowing dust will make driving difficult. Road closures are possible today and likely on Thursday. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain
